memberdef.argsstring: (const double &x, const Grid &frequencies, const std::function< Q(const int &)> val) -> Q
memberdef.name: interpolate_nearest1D

briefdescription.para: TODO: improve performance, allow more inlining.

detaileddescription.para:
Interpolation functions: --> linear interpolation --> linear interpolation on auxiliary (linear) frequency grid --> sloppy cubic interpolation (constructs Lagrange polynomial with points at positions i-1, i, i+1 and i+2 for the interval between i and i+1) Interpolates in 0th order in 1D (on linear, auxiliary frequency grid) ATTENTION!: all
Q
double or comp
x
frequencies
frequencyGrid with the functions get_grid_index and with x-values in vector all_frequencies
val
any function that takes one integer and returns a value of type Q

memberdef.argsstring: (const double &x, const double &y, const Grid &xfrequencies, const Grid &yfrequencies, const std::function< Q(const int &, const int &)> val) -> Q
memberdef.name: interpolate_nearest2D

param.type: const std::function< Q(const int &, const int &)>

detaileddescription.para:
Interpolates in 0th order in 2D (on linear, auxiliary frequency grid)
Q
double or comp
x
y
xfrequencies
frequencyGrid with the functions get_grid_index and with x-values in vector all_frequencies
yfrequencies
frequencyGrid with the functions get_grid_index and with y-values in vector all_frequencies
val
any function f(i,j) that takes two integers and returns a value of type Q where integer i belongs to x and integer j belongs to y
